question: Where is Professor John Does office located, and what is his area of expertise, given that he instructs the advanced robotics course?
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)
WHERE professor.first_name = "John" AND professor.last_name = "Doe" AND course.name = "advanced robotics"
RETURN professor, teaches, course, professor.office, professor.specialization

question: Could you give me the detailed attributes of the course Introduction to Machine Learning?
cypher:
MATCH (course:Course) 
WHERE course.name = "Introduction to Machine Learning"
RETURN course, course.course_id, course.name, course.description, course.credits, course.level

question: What are the email and date of birth of the student Sarah Smith enrolled in the cybersecurity course?
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[enrollment:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)
WHERE student.first_name = "Sarah" AND student.last_name = "Smith" AND course.name = "cybersecurity"
RETURN student, enrollment, course, student.email, student.date_of_birth

question: Please provide me with the description and date for the Annual Computer Science Conference.
cypher:
MATCH (conference:Event) 
WHERE conference.title = "Annual Computer Science Conference"
RETURN conference, conference.description, conference.date

question: Can you provide the building name and room number for the classroom where the Data Structures course is held?
cypher:
MATCH (course:Course)-[relation3:TEACHES]-(node1:Professor)-[relation4:LECTURES_IN]->(classroom:Classroom) 
WHERE course.name = "Data Structures"
RETURN relation4, relation3, node1, course, classroom, classroom.building, classroom.room_number

question: What is the name and budget of the department situated in the Tech Building?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)
WHERE department.building = "Tech Building"
RETURN department, department.name, department.budget

question: How many courses are offered by the Computer Science department?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[offer:OFFERS]->(course:Course)
WHERE department.name="Computer Science"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT course)

question: What is the maximum capacity of classrooms across the university?
cypher:
MATCH (classroom:Classroom)
RETURN MAX(classroom.capacity)

question: Can you calculate the average number of students enrolled per professor in technology-related courses?
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[relation3:TEACHES]->(course:Course)<-[relation4:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)
WHERE course.description CONTAINS "technology"
WITH professor, COUNT(DISTINCT student) AS studentsEnrolled
RETURN AVG(studentsEnrolled)

question: What is the total number of events planned to be held in the Main Auditorium?
cypher:
MATCH (classroom:Classroom {building: 'Main Auditorium'})<-[held:HELD_IN]-(event:Event)
RETURN COUNT(event)

question: Calculate the mean budget for all departments located in the Engineering Complex.
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)
WHERE department.building = "Engineering Complex"
RETURN AVG(department.budget)

question: How many professors work in departments with a budget greater than $1 million?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)<-[manages:MANAGES]-(professor:Professor)
WHERE department.budget > 1000000
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT professor)

question: List the names and capacities of classrooms where events attended by students majoring in Art History scheduled after January 1, 2023, were held.
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[attend:ATTENDS]->(event:Event)-[held_in:HELD_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
MATCH (student)-[belong:BELONGS_TO]->(department:Department)
WHERE department.name="Art History" AND event.date >= date("2023-01-01")
RETURN student, attend, event, held_in, classroom, belong, department, classroom.building, classroom.room_number, classroom.capacity

question: Fetch the first and last names of students who are mentored by professors with expertise in Quantum Mechanics and who are registered in level 300 courses.
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[advises:ADVISES]->(student:Student)-[enrolled:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)
WHERE professor.specialization="Quantum Mechanics" AND course.level="300"
RETURN professor, advises, student, enrolled, course, student.first_name, student.last_name

question: Provide details of all courses, including description and level, that are taught by professors whose specialization is Machine Learning and are housed within the Engineering department.
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)
MATCH (department:Department)-[offers:OFFERS]->(course)
WHERE professor.specialization="Machine Learning" AND department.name="Engineering"
RETURN professor, teaches, course, department, offers, course.description, course.level

question: Could you display the first and last names of professors instructing in Algorithms courses that are taken by students involved in Tech Fest 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (event:Event)<-[attend:ATTENDS]-(student:Student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)<-[relation6:TEACHES]-(prof:Professor)
WHERE event.title="Tech Fest 2022" AND course.name="Algorithms"
RETURN relation6, prof, event, attend, student, enroll, course, prof.first_name, prof.last_name

question: Find the birthdates and email addresses of students who are registered in the Biology departments courses and have participated in events at Green Hall.
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)<-[offer:OFFERS]-(department:Department)
MATCH (student)-[attend:ATTENDS]->(event:Event)-[held:HELD_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
WHERE department.name="Biology" AND classroom.building="Green Hall"
RETURN student, enroll, course, offer, department, attend, event, held, classroom, student.email, student.date_of_birth

question: Can you find the time schedule for professors who lecture in classrooms located in Hilltop Building and advise students enrolled in the Physics department?
cypher:
MATCH (classroom:Classroom)<-[relation6:HELD_IN]-(event:Event)
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[lecture:LECTURES_IN]->(classroom)
MATCH (professor)-[advise:ADVISES]->(student:Student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)
MATCH (department:Department)<-[belongs:BELONGS_TO]-(student)
WHERE classroom.building = 'Hilltop Building' AND department.name = 'Physics'
RETURN relation6, professor, lecture, classroom, event, student, advise, enroll, course, department, belongs, lecture.scheduled_time

question: I am interested in the semester and year of courses taught by professors managing departments with budgets greater than 200k, primarily in the Humanities faculty.
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[manages:MANAGES]->(department:Department)-[offers:OFFERS]->(course:Course),
      (professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course)
WHERE department.budget > 200000 AND department.name = 'Humanities'
RETURN professor, manages, department, offers, course, teaches, teaches.semester, teaches.year

question: What are the attendance dates for students attending seminars in Lecture Hall A who are also enrolled in Introduction to Philosophy?
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[attend:ATTENDS]->(event:Event)-[held:HELD_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
MATCH (student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)
WHERE classroom.building = 'Lecture Hall A' AND course.name = 'Introduction to Philosophy'
RETURN student, attend, event, held, classroom, enroll, course, attend.attendance_date

question: Could you monitor the registration and grading records from 2019 to 2022 for students guided by professors who teach Advanced Calculus?
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)
MATCH (professor)-[advises:ADVISES]->(student:Student)-[enrolled:ENROLLED_IN]->(enrollmentCourse:Course)
WHERE course.name="Advanced Calculus" AND enrolled.enrollment_date.year >= 2019 AND enrolled.enrollment_date.year <= 2022
RETURN professor, teaches, course, advises, student, enrolled, enrollmentCourse, enrolled.grade

question: Please provide the scheduled lecture times and associated course levels for professors from the Computer Science department.
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[offer:OFFERS]->(course:Course)<-[teach:TEACHES]-(professor:Professor)-[lecture:LECTURES_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
WHERE department.name="Computer Science"
RETURN offer, department, professor, teach, course, lecture, classroom, lecture.scheduled_time, course.level

question: Determine the enrollment date ranges for students in courses managed by professors who hold offices in the Central building.
cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[manages:MANAGES]->(dept:Department)-[offers:OFFERS]->(course:Course)<-[enrolledIn:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)
WHERE prof.office CONTAINS 'Central'
RETURN prof, manages, dept, offers, course, enrolledIn, student, enrolledIn.enrollment_date

question: Could you determine the lowest and highest number of credits for courses offered by the Mathematics department professors with over five students enrolled?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[relation4:OFFERS]->(course:Course)<-[relation5:TEACHES]-(professor:Professor)
WHERE department.name = "Mathematics"
WITH course, COUNT(DISTINCT professor) AS professorsCount, COUNT(DISTINCT course) AS courseCount
MATCH (student:Student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course)
WITH course, professorsCount, courseCount, COUNT(DISTINCT student) AS studentsEnrolled
WHERE studentsEnrolled > 5
RETURN MIN(course.credits) AS MinCredits, MAX(course.credits) AS MaxCredits

question: Can you calculate how many events in each building during the 2021-2022 academic year had attendance numbers surpassing the classroom capacity by at least 20 people?
cypher:
MATCH (classroom:Classroom)<-[held_in:HELD_IN]-(event:Event)-[attend:ATTENDS]-(student:Student)
WITH classroom, event, COUNT(student) AS attendees
WHERE event.date.year >= 2021 AND event.date.year <= 2022 AND attendees >= (classroom.capacity + 20)
RETURN classroom.building, COUNT(DISTINCT event) AS events_count

question: Compute the average grade of students enrolled in Computer Programming 101 who attended Coding Day event in 2022.
cypher:
MATCH (course:Course)-[enrollment:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)-[attendance:ATTENDS]->(event:Event)
WHERE course.name = 'Computer Programming 101' AND event.title = 'Coding Day' AND event.date.year = 2022
RETURN AVG(enrollment.grade)

question: Determine which department has the largest budget, given that their students attended a minimum of three distinct university events in the 2023 academic year.
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)<-[relation3:BELONGS_TO]-(student:Student)-[relation4:ATTENDS]->(event:Event)
WHERE event.date.year = 2023
WITH department, COUNT(DISTINCT event) AS events_count
WHERE events_count >= 3
RETURN MAX(department.budget) AS highest_budget

question: What is the email address and office location of the professor teaching the course with ID 102 during the Spring 2023 semester?
cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)
WHERE course.course_id = 102 AND teaches.semester = "Spring" AND teaches.year = 2023
RETURN prof, teaches, course, prof.email, prof.office

question: Could you supply the first name, last name, and gender for the student with ID 458 registered in the Data Structures course?
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[enrollment:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)
WHERE student.student_id = 458 AND course.name = 'Data Structures'
RETURN student, enrollment, course, student.first_name, student.last_name, student.gender

question: What are the name and description of the course offered by the Electrical Engineering department that requires 3 credits?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[offer:OFFERS]->(course:Course)
WHERE department.name="Electrical Engineering" AND course.credits=3
RETURN department, offer, course, course.name, course.description

question: Which professor managed the Finance department starting from January 1st, 2018 to December 31st, 2021?
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[manages:MANAGES]->(department:Department)
WHERE department.name = "Finance" AND manages.start_date >= date("2018-01-01") AND manages.end_date <= date("2021-12-31")
RETURN professor, manages, department, professor.professor_id, professor.first_name, professor.last_name

question: Determine the largest capacity and number of the room that hosted the Graduation 2023 event.
cypher:
MATCH (event:Event)-[heldInRelation:HELD_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
WHERE event.title = 'Graduation 2023'
RETURN event, heldInRelation, classroom, classroom.capacity, classroom.room_number

question: List the first names and emails of all students associated with the department in the Thompson building.
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[belongs:BELONGS_TO]->(department:Department)
WHERE department.building = 'Thompson'
RETURN student, belongs, department, student.first_name, student.email

question: What grade did student John Doe receive in the Algorithms course he enrolled in on September 1st, 2021?
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[enrollment:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)
WHERE student.first_name="John" AND student.last_name="Doe" AND course.name="Algorithms" AND enrollment.enrollment_date = date("2021-09-01")
RETURN student, enrollment, course, enrollment.grade

question: Who taught the Introduction to Psychology course in Fall 2022, and what was their area of expertise?
cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)
WHERE course.name="Introduction to Psychology" AND teaches.semester="Fall" AND teaches.year=2022
RETURN prof, teaches, course, prof.specialization

question: When did the professor who started advising student Sarah Miller in 2019 cease their advisory role?
cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[advise:ADVISES]->(student:Student)
WHERE student.first_name = "Sarah" AND student.last_name = "Miller" AND advise.start_date.year = 2019
RETURN prof, advise, student, advise.end_date

question: What was the attendance date for student Emily Tran for the event titled Career Fair 2021?
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[attendance:ATTENDS]->(event:Event)
WHERE student.first_name="Emily" AND student.last_name="Tran" AND event.title="Career Fair 2021"
RETURN student, attendance, event, attendance.attendance_date

question: Which department offers the course with ID 304, and what is its building location?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[offering:OFFERS]->(course:Course)
WHERE course.course_id = 304
RETURN department, offering, course, department.name, department.building

question: How many students are enrolled in each course offered by the Mathematics department?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[relation3:OFFERS]->(course:Course)<-[relation4:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)
WHERE department.name = "Mathematics"
RETURN course.name, COUNT(student) AS NumberOfStudents

question: What is the average grade of students enrolled in the Organic Chemistry course?
cypher:
MATCH (course:Course)<-[enrolled:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)
WHERE course.name = "Organic Chemistry"
RETURN AVG(enrolled.grade)

question: Count the number of students who attended the New Year Gala 2022 event held in the Main Auditorium.
cypher:
MATCH (event:Event)<-[attends:ATTENDS]-(student:Student)
MATCH (classroom:Classroom)<-[held_in:HELD_IN]-(event)
WHERE event.title = "New Year Gala 2022" AND classroom.building = "Main Auditorium"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT student)

question: What is the minimum and maximum number of credits offered by courses in the Biology department?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[offer:OFFERS]->(course:Course)
WHERE department.name = "Biology"
RETURN MIN(course.credits) AS MinCredits, MAX(course.credits) AS MaxCredits

question: How many professors have taught the Quantum Mechanics course since 2018?
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)
WHERE course.name = "Quantum Mechanics" AND teaches.year >= 2018
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT professor)

question: What is the total capacity of all classrooms where events titled Orientation Day were held in 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (event:Event)-[held_in:HELD_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
WHERE event.title="Orientation Day" AND event.date.year=2023
RETURN SUM(classroom.capacity)

question: Can you provide the names of students who are enrolled in the Advanced Algorithms course taught by Professor Smith in the Computer Science department?
cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)-[offer:OFFERS]-(dept:Department), (student:Student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course)
WHERE prof.last_name="Smith" AND course.name="Advanced Algorithms" AND dept.name="Computer Science"
RETURN student, prof, teaches, course, offer, dept, enroll, student.first_name, student.last_name

question: What are the office locations and specializations of professors teaching Introduction to Psychology for students in the Humanities department?
cypher:
MATCH (course:Course)-[taught:TEACHES]-(prof:Professor)-[manages:MANAGES]->(dept:Department {name:"Humanities"})
WHERE course.name="Introduction to Psychology"
RETURN prof, taught, course, manages, dept, prof.office, prof.specialization

question: Could you list the email addresses of professors who teach Quantum Mechanics courses taken by students born after January 1st, 2000?
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)<-[teaches:TEACHES]-(professor:Professor)
WHERE student.date_of_birth > date('2000-01-01') AND course.name = "Quantum Mechanics"
RETURN student, enroll, course, teaches, professor, professor.email

question: What is the seating capacity of the classrooms used for Microeconomics courses provided by the Economics department?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department {name:"Economics"})-[relation4:OFFERS]->(course:Course {name:"Microeconomics"})
MATCH (course)<-[relation5:TEACHES]-(professor:Professor)
MATCH (classroom:Classroom)<-[relation6:LECTURES_IN]-(professor)
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, department, course, professor, classroom, classroom.capacity

question: Please provide the first and last names of all students enrolled in Machine Learning, which is offered by the Information Technology department and taught by a professor specializing in Artificial Intelligence.
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department {name:"Information Technology"})-[relation4:OFFERS]->(course:Course {name:"Machine Learning"})<-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)
MATCH (professor:Professor {specialization:"Artificial Intelligence"})-[relation6:TEACHES]->(course)
RETURN relation6, relation4, student, enroll, course, department, professor, student.first_name, student.last_name

question: Who are the professors with an office in the Engineering Building that teach courses where students from the Biotechnology department are enrolled?
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor {office:"Engineering Building"})-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course)<-[enrolled:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)-[belongs:BELONGS_TO]->(department:Department {name:"Biotechnology"})
RETURN professor, teaches, course, enrolled, student, belongs, department, professor.first_name, professor.last_name, professor.email

question: What are the grades received by students of the Physics department in courses taught by Professor Johnson during the Fall semester of 2021?
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)<-[teaches:TEACHES]-(professor:Professor),
      (department:Department)-[offer:OFFERS]->(course),
      (student)-[belong:BELONGS_TO]->(department)
WHERE department.name = "Physics" AND professor.last_name = "Johnson" AND teaches.semester = "Fall" AND teaches.year = 2021
RETURN student, enroll, course, teaches, professor, department, belong, offer, enroll.grade

question: Could you tell me the semesters and years when students who attended Contemporary Arts workshops also enrolled in courses held by a professor with the office number 405B?
cypher:
MATCH (evt:Event {title:"Contemporary Arts"})<-[attend:ATTENDS]-(student:Student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)<-[teach:TEACHES]-(prof:Professor {office:"405B"})
RETURN student, attend, evt, enroll, course, teach, prof, teach.semester, teach.year

question: What are the enrollment dates for students in the Marketing department taking the Consumer Behavior course taught in Spring 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (student:Student)-[enroll:ENROLLED_IN]->(course:Course)
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course)
MATCH (student)-[belong:BELONGS_TO]->(department:Department)
WHERE department.name="Marketing" AND course.name="Consumer Behavior" AND teaches.semester="Spring" AND teaches.year=2022
RETURN student, enroll, course, professor, teaches, department, belong, enroll.enrollment_date

question: Could you identify the time frames (from beginning to end) where professors were in charge of the Chemistry department and instructed Organic Chemistry classes?
cypher:
MATCH (prof:Professor)-[manages:MANAGES]->(dept:Department {name: "Chemistry"})
MATCH (prof)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course {name: "Organic Chemistry"})
RETURN prof, manages, dept, teaches, course, manages.start_date, manages.end_date

question: What is the latest attendance date of any student from the Law department to events held in the Main Auditorium?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department {name:"Law"})-[belongsTo:BELONGS_TO]-(student:Student)-[attends:ATTENDS]->(event:Event)
MATCH (event)-[heldIn:HELD_IN]->(classroom:Classroom {building:"Main Auditorium"})
RETURN department, belongsTo, student, attends, event, heldIn, classroom, MAX(attends.attendance_date)

question: Kindly supply the schedule for lectures conducted by professors in Room 101 of the Business Building, who also counsel students pursuing a major in Finance.
cypher:
MATCH (professor:Professor)-[lectures:LECTURES_IN]->(classroom:Classroom {building:"Business Building", room_number:"Room 101"})
MATCH (professor)-[advises:ADVISES]->(student:Student)-[belongs:BELONGS_TO]->(department:Department {name:"Finance"})
RETURN professor, lectures, classroom, advises, student, belongs, department, lectures.scheduled_time

question: How many male students in the Psychology department are under the guidance of professors who specialize in Clinical Psychology?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)<-[relation3:BELONGS_TO]-(student:Student)-[advise:ADVISES]-(professor:Professor)
WHERE department.name = "Psychology" AND student.gender = "male" AND professor.specialization = "Clinical Psychology"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT student)

question: Can you count the number of courses offered by the History department that have been taught by more than three different professors?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[relation3:OFFERS]->(course:Course)<-[relation4:TEACHES]-(professor:Professor)
WHERE department.name = "History"
WITH course, COUNT(DISTINCT professor) AS professorsCount
WHERE professorsCount > 3
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT course)

question: What is the mean number of credits for courses in the Electrical Engineering department, where more than 50 events have been hosted, taken by students?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[relation6:OFFERS]->(course:Course)<-[relation7:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)-[relation8:BELONGS_TO]->(dept:Department)
WHERE department.name="Electrical Engineering"
WITH dept, course
MATCH (classroom:Classroom)<-[relation9:HELD_IN]-(event:Event)
WITH dept, course, classroom, COUNT(event) AS numEvents
WHERE numEvents > 50
RETURN AVG(course.credits)

question: Could I get the total number of students from the Computer Science department enrolled in courses related to Data Structures taught by professors who also manage the department?
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department)-[relation5:MANAGES]-(professor:Professor)-[relation6:TEACHES]->(course:Course)<-[relation7:ENROLLED_IN]-(student:Student)-[relation8:BELONGS_TO]->(sameDepartment:Department)
WHERE department.name = "Computer Science" AND course.name CONTAINS "Data Structures" AND sameDepartment.name = "Computer Science"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT student)

question: What is the maximum capacity of classrooms where Public Speaking events were held, which have been attended by students from the Communications department?
cypher:
MATCH (event:Event)-[held_in:HELD_IN]->(classroom:Classroom)
WHERE event.title = "Public Speaking"
MATCH (student:Student)-[attends:ATTENDS]->(event)
MATCH (student)-[belongs_to:BELONGS_TO]->(department:Department)
WHERE department.name = "Communications"
RETURN MAX(classroom.capacity)

question: Determine the lowest score obtained by students enrolled in Artificial Intelligence classes overseen by faculty members of the Tech Innovations department.
cypher:
MATCH (department:Department {name: "Tech Innovations"})-[manages:MANAGES]-(professor:Professor)-[teaches:TEACHES]->(course:Course {name: "Artificial Intelligence"}), 
(student:Student)-[enrolled:ENROLLED_IN]->(course)
RETURN MIN(enrolled.grade)
